verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> ye the LORD<WH3050>. Praise<WH1984> ye the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068>; praise<WH1984> him, O ye servants<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068>.
Ye that stand<WH5975> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068>, in the courts<WH2691> of the house<WH1004> of our God<WH430>,
Praise<WH1984> the LORD<WH3050>; for the LORD<WH3068> is good<WH2896>: sing praises<WH2167> unto his name<WH8034>; for it is pleasant<WH5273>.
For the LORD<WH3050> hath chosen<WH977> Jacob<WH3290> unto himself, and Israel<WH3478> for his peculiar treasure<WH5459>.
For I know<WH3045> that the LORD<WH3068> is great<WH1419>, and that our Lord<WH113> is above all gods<WH430>.
Whatsoever the LORD<WH3068> pleased<WH2654>, that did<WH6213> he in heaven<WH8064>, and in earth<WH776>, in the seas<WH3220>, and all deep places<WH8415>.

He causeth the vapours<WH5387> to ascend<WH5927> from the ends<WH7097> of the earth<WH776>; he maketh<WH6213> lightnings<WH1300> for the rain<WH4306>; he bringeth<WH3318> the wind<WH7307> out of his treasuries<WH214>.
Who smote<WH5221> the firstborn<WH1060> of Egypt<WH4714>, both of man<WH120> and beast<WH929>. both: Heb. from man unto beast
Who sent<WH7971> tokens<WH226> and wonders<WH4159> into the midst<WH8432> of thee, O Egypt<WH4714>, upon Pharaoh<WH6547>, and upon all his servants<WH5650>.
Who smote<WH5221> great<WH7227> nations<WH1471>, and slew<WH2026> mighty<WH6099> kings<WH4428>;
Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, and Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316>, and all the kingdoms<WH4467> of Canaan<WH3667>:
And gave<WH5414> their land<WH776> for an heritage<WH5159>, an heritage<WH5159> unto Israel<WH3478> his people<WH5971>.
Thy name<WH8034>, O LORD<WH3068>, endureth for ever<WH5769>; and thy memorial<WH2143>, O LORD<WH3068>, throughout all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>. throughout: Heb. to generation and generation
For the LORD<WH3068> will judge<WH1777> his people<WH5971>, and he will repent<WH5162> himself concerning his servants<WH5650>.
The idols<WH6091> of the heathen<WH1471> are silver<WH3701> and gold<WH2091>, the work<WH4639> of men's<WH120> hands<WH3027>.
They have mouths<WH6310>, but they speak<WH1696> not; eyes<WH5869> have they, but they see<WH7200> not;
They have ears<WH241>, but they hear<WH238> not; neither is there<WH3426> any breath<WH7307> in their mouths<WH6310>.
They that make<WH6213> them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth<WH982> in them.
Bless<WH1288> the LORD<WH3068>, O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: bless<WH1288> the LORD<WH3068>, O house<WH1004> of Aaron<WH175>:
Bless<WH1288> the LORD<WH3068>, O house<WH1004> of Levi<WH3878>: ye that fear<WH3373> the LORD<WH3068>, bless<WH1288> the LORD<WH3068>.
Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD<WH3068> out of Zion<WH6726>, which dwelleth<WH7931> at Jerusalem<WH3389>. Praise<WH1984> ye the LORD<WH3050>.
